main event: A photograph depicting a disc-shaped unidentified flying object (UFO) was taken on November 2, 1956, in Bostonia, California.
interesting points: The UFO appears to be disc-shaped and emitting a slight glow., The photograph shows a tree silhouette at the bottom, indicating the perspective from the ground., The object is tilted and displays a classic 'flying saucer' appearance., The image contains shadows casting beneath the UFO., There are bright light sources in the image contributing to its luminous appearance.
witness description: Technician-instructor in an air materials department, reliable with a high degree of integrity.
